FuncDef: This command configures a Python script for the specified GTPv1-C message type in the specified direction.
CLIs: gtpv1-c <type> direction { ingress | egress } script [ script ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the message type. Values-echo-request, echo-response, version-not-supported, create-pdp-context-request, create-pdp-context-response, delete-pdp-context-request, delete-pdp-context-response, error-indication.
Specifies if the message is incoming or outgoing.
Specifies the name of the Python script up to 32 characters, that will be used to handle the specified message.
